General.Name: China Steel Structure Co Ltd
General.Description: China Steel Structure Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells steel structures in Taiwan. The company designs, processes, manufactures, assembles, and sells various steel sections and frames, machine bodies, hydraulic engineering machinery, tanks, crane and plant equipment, and steel towers and pipes; provides technical services for steel structure engineering; imports and exports metal products and construction materials; trades in steel products; and offers construction and installation services for civil construction works. It also undertakes contracts for civil engineering, architecture, and bridges, as well as steel structure installation. In addition, the company provides steel structures for high-rise buildings, factories, and bridges, as well as mechanical structures, petrochemical pipelines and tanks, and pipeline supports; and leases office buildings. It also exports its products to Mainland China and Southeast Asia. The company was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
